overview: "You're Not My Real Dad!!"... is what one girl said when she was told to clean her room and do the dishes. Then she thought, "He's not my real dad!!.. and I'll be he has a huge black cock that I can ride all day long when mom is at work."  They didn't get along at first, but now this little girl loves her new black stepdaddy.. Especially his big dick!
title: My New Black Stepdaddy 2
